output.sentences: The meat was set on the counter, thawed and ready to be prepared.
All of the supplied were laid on the counter so the cook was ready to go.
A woman sat at the table getting the stuffing ready to go into the oven.
Finally it was time to enjoy the meat.
The diners took a picture to remember this special meal together.
